data.title: Arizona Science Center
data.text:
Discover the world of science and imagination at Arizona Science Center today! Our events and attractions, including the Irene P. Flinn Giant Screen Theater and The W.O.N.D.E.R. Center, give audiences and Guests the chance to embark in hands-on learning and create a memorable experience that will last a lifetime.

Crafts & Cocktails

August 16 | 6:00 – 10:00 p.m.

Whether you’re curious about the art of jewelry-making, a self-proclaimed “bad” artist, or simply enjoy creating and crafting, you’re invited to Arizona Science Center’s next Science With a TWIST, Crafts & Cocktails! Curious creatives will have the chance to explore the ‘A’ in STEAM through expert-led sketching classes, jewelry-making, a bad art station, community art wall and more. Plus, we’re adding a twist with delicious craft cocktails inspired by some of the world’s most iconic artwork!

Learn More

Amazing Agriculture

August 17 | 1:00 – 4:00 p.m.

Whether you’re an aspiring veterinarian, curious about livestock nutrition or want to know more about the science behind agriculture, Arizona Science Center’s next Panel Professionals will offer expert insight into the fascinating world of agriculture! Science Center Members and Guests will be able to participate in an engaging, hour-long Q+A session with Dr. Tony Martin, Sarah Radachy, Dr. Juan Rodríguez and Dr. Michelle Schack. After the panel, workshops will be available to get hands-on experience into what a day in the life looks like within a career in agriculture.

Learn More

Mesmerica XL

August 18 | September 15

5:00 p.m. | 6:30 p.m.

Out of the dome and into a giant-screen cinema—be one of the first to experience the world of Mesmerica in a whole new way with Mesmerica XL!

Learn More

Desert Discoveries

September 14 | 9:00 a.m. – 3:00 p.m.

Discover science found right here in Arizona—the desert! At the next Girls in STEM event, Desert Discoveries, participants will investigate what makes the desert so unique. Through hands-on activities, like-minded peer engagement and local STEM Mentors, we’ll explore amazing animal adaptations that allow our desert dwellers to survive in harsh environments, the art of biomimicry and sustaining energy through food webs.

Learn More

Space: The New Frontier

10:00 a.m. | 12:00 p.m. | 2:00 p.m.

Irene P. Flinn Giant Screen Theater, Level 1

Discover the next step for humankind and spaceflight with Space: The New Frontier! From self-assembling habitats, commercial space stations, launching rockets without fuel to building the Lunar Gateway to deep space, history is in the making as we speak.

Learn More

Blue Whales: Return Of The Giants

11:00 a.m. | 1:00 p.m.

Irene P. Flinn Giant Screen Theater, Level 1

Blue Whales: Return of the Giants 3D takes viewers on a journey of a lifetime to explore the world of the magnificent blue whale—a species rebounding from the brink of extinction. Blue whales are the largest animals ever to have lived, bigger than any dinosaur, yet we know surprisingly little about them. Joined by a cast of supporting characters, from dolphins and sperm whales to sea lions and orcas, the blue whale finally gets a turn in the spotlight—in life-size on the giant screen!

Learn More

OceanXperience

February 4 – September 2

Sybil B. Harrington Gallery, Level 3

Included with Membership or General Admission

Climb aboard an interactive replica of OceanXplorer, the most advanced research and filmmaking vessel in the world! An exhibition designed for all ages, OceanXperience gives visitors access to OceanX’s renowned OceanXplorer vessel and the cutting-edge science, technology, and media the ship uses to explore the ocean and bring it back to the world

Learn more

Dazzling Demonstrations

Daniel Cracchiolo Theater, Level 1

Join Arizona Science Center for live, daily demonstrations that inspire, educate and engage curious minds! Each 15-minute show is available every hour starting at 10:30 a.m. and is included with your Arizona Science Center Membership or general admission

Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis. Arizona Science Center's Dazzling Demonstrations are generously supported by DMB Associates.

Learn More

Under The Hood

Engineered By Subaru

CREATE at Arizona Science Center®, Atrium

Discover the world of automotive science with Under the Hood, Engineered by Subaru, to find out! Explore the mechanics of an engine, learn how vehicles are designed and assembled, engineer the fastest car possible, test your skills on the track, and more.

Learn More

Member-Only Weekend Hours

As a thank you to our beloved Members, The Center will open at 9:30 a.m. on Saturdays and Sundays exclusively for Members. General admission begins at 10:30 a.m.

Not a Member? Become an Arizona Science Center Member today!

LEarn More
